footer.about: We build attractive, high-converting product landing pages and product detail experiences tailored for ecommerce brands. Fast, accessible and designed to sell.

meta.title: About — E-commerce Product Pages

hero.title: Built for stores that want beautiful product pages — fast
hero.desc: We design components and templates focused on conversion, performance and localization so your product pages convert more visitors into customers.

mission.label: Our mission
mission.title: Design for conversion, ship faster
mission.desc: We build composable, accessible and high-performance blocks that make product pages simple to assemble and fast to iterate.

values.desc: Principles that guide design and engineering decisions — focused on clarity, speed and international compatibility.

performance.title: Performance
performance.desc: Fast images and small bundles for snappy UX.

global.title: Global-first
global.desc: Locale and currency-aware components; RTL-friendly by design.

composable.title: Composable
composable.desc: Blocks designed to mix-and-match for fast iteration.

trust.title: Trust
trust.desc: Accessible markup and clear interactions for all users.
